description: Luton Town sign young Tottenham forward Nathan Oduwa on a youth loan and extend Jayden Stockley's stay.
title: Transfer Deadline Day: Nathan Oduwa leaves Tottenham for Luton
title_page: Transfer Deadline Day: Nathan Oduwa leaves Tottenham for Luton - BBC Sport
maintext:
Luton Town have signed Tottenham forward Nathan Oduwa on a youth loan until the summer, and extended the spell of Bournemouth striker Jayden Stockley by a further month.
Stockley, 21, has played once since joining the Hatters in early January.
Oduwa, 18, who can play wide left or up front, has scored twice in 14 under-21 matches for Spurs this season.
"Nathan is very highly thought of at Tottenham and we're thrilled to have him," said Luton boss John Still., external
"Nathan is strong, powerful, skilful and has pace to burn. He's a player who gets supporters off their seats."
